snippets.message: Give me a full review of this PR.
Review the changes for security issues: input validation, authentication, authorization, injection attacks, error handling, secrets exposure, rate limiting.
Walk through each commit in order, explaining the author's intent for each change and flagging any issues.
Assess the structural changes: modularity, coupling, separation of concerns, design patterns, and how the changes fit the existing architecture.
Evaluate test coverage of the changes. What functionality is tested? What edge cases are missing? Are the test assertions meaningful?
Write a pull request description summarizing these changes, including: what changed, why, how to test, and any migration notes.
Review for code quality: naming, duplication, complexity, error handling, documentation, and adherence to the codebase's existing patterns.
Review only the files I have selected.
Are there any broken call chains, missing imports, or orphaned references after these changes?
Summarize what this PR changes in 3-4 sentences.
